Description: Gorgeous west side 2nd floor unit offers 2 bedrooms, 1 full bath renovated unit presents with open floor plan, updated kitchen with stainless steel appliances, recessed lighting, hardwood floors, gas fireplace, deck, and more. Large bedrooms and in unit laundry. Unbeatable location with easy access to T, bus, Seaport, downtown, highway access, and all South Boston has to offer. Available Sept 1, 2023. Excellent credit and references a must.
